title: Gage Bias Analysis
variableRefSelcted: Select the variable for reference/standard value
label1: Select at least one, either the measurement/response or the bias
includeLinearityStudyChk: Include Linearity Study in addition to Type 1 Study
stdevMethodLabel: Method to use for estimating repeatability std dev
tolerance: Tolerance - numeric value for the tolerance
useHistStdDevProcVarChk: Use historical std dev to calculate RF (Reference Figure)
showPValuetChk: Show p value in Gage Bias table
showReferenceLineChk: Show Reference line on the Run Chart
showReferenceToleranceLineChk: Show Reference lines with tolerance bounds
I_XbarOne_Stddev: Run chart - standard deviation method to be used

help.title: Gage bias analysis
help.body:
Description
Function to perform linearity bias analysis

For the detail help - use R help(lm, package = stats)

To try this, you may use the sample dataset files linearityBias.xlsx. Open the files in the data grid with file open menu
Choose the variables from the selection box, Reference and Measurement
